unit.name: Common Orc Warlord
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Heavy Armour, Common Orc

unit.name: Feral Orc Warlord
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Aegis (5+), Feral Orc

unit.name: Iron Orc Warlord
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Plate Armour, Iron Orc

unit.name: Common Orc Chief
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Heavy Armour, Common Orc

unit.name: Feral Orc Chief
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Aegis (5+), Feral Orc

unit.name: Iron Orc Chief
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Plate Armour, Iron Orc

unit.name: Common Orc Shaman
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Light Armour, Common Orc

unit.name: Feral Orc Shaman
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Aegis (5+), Feral Orc

unit.name: Common Goblin King
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Light Armour, Common Goblin

unit.name: Cave Goblin King
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Light Armour, Cave Goblin

unit.name: Forest Goblin King
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Light Armour, Forest Goblin, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Common Goblin Chief
unit.description: 0-6 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Light Armour, Shield, Common Goblin

unit.name: Cave Goblin Chief
unit.description: 0-6 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Light Armour, Shield, Cave Goblin

unit.name: Forest Goblin Chief
unit.description: 0-6 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Light Armour, Shield, Forest Goblin, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Common Goblin Witch Doctor
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Common Goblin, Light Armour

unit.name: Cave Goblin Witch Doctor
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Cave Goblin, Power Shroom (x2).

unit.name: Forest Goblin Witch Doctor
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Forest Goblin

unit.name: Orcs
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Scoring, Common Orc: Light Armour and Feral Orc: Aegis (6+)

unit.name: Orc Eadbashers
unit.description: 0-1 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Scoring, Common Orc: Light Armour and Feral Orc: Aegis (6+)

unit.name: Orc Boar Rider
unit.description: 0-4 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base: 25x50 mm, Scoring, Common Orc: Light Armour and Feral Orc: Aegis (6+)+Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Orc Boar Rider: Light Lance, War Boar: Harnessed, Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP)

unit.name: Goblins
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Scoring

unit.name: Goblin Raiders (Core)
unit.description: 0-4 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base: 25x50 mm, Common Goblin: Light Armour + Wolf, Forest Goblin: Scuttler Spider + Poison Attacks +Scout + Strider, Feigned Flight, Vanguard, Light Troops, Wolf: Harnessed. Scuttler Spider: Harnessed, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Iron Orcs
unit.description: Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25x25 mm, Scoring, Bodyguard (Iron Orc Warlord, Iron Orc Chief), Plate Armour, Shield, Iron Orc, Paired Weapons, Great Weapon

unit.name: Orc Boar Chariot
unit.description: 0-3 Units per Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base: 50x100 mm, Swiftstride, Light Armour, Eadbasher Crew (2): Common Orc, Lance, War Boar (2): Harnessed, Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Chassis: Impact Hits (D6+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Mounted Orc Eadbasher
unit.description: 0-4 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base: 25x50 mm, Scoring, Common Orc: Heavy Armour and Feral Orc: Aegis (6+)+Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Mounted Eadbasher: Light Lance, War Boar: Harnessed, Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP)

unit.name: Goblin Raiders
unit.description: 0-4 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base: 25x50 mm, Common Goblin: Light Armour + Wolf, Forest Goblin: Scuttler Spider + Poison Attacks +Scout + Strider, Feigned Flight, Vanguard, Light Troops, Wolf: Harnessed. Scuttler Spider: Harnessed, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Goblin Wolf Chariot
unit.description: 0-3 Units per Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base: 50x100 mm, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Light Armour, Goblin Crew (3): Common Goblin, Light Lance, Bow (4+), Wolf (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Gnasher Dashers
unit.description: 0-3 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base: 20x20 mm,Fearless, Fly (6", 12"), Light Troops, Oi it bites, Light Armour, Goblin Rider: Cave Goblin, Gnasher: Harnessed, Rows of Teeth

unit.name: Gnasher Herd
unit.description: 0-5 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base: 20x20 mm, Fearless, Insignificant, Oi it bites, They are Everywhere

unit.name: Gnasher Wrecking Team
unit.description: 0-2 Units per Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base: 60 mm round,Fearless, Random Movement (3D6"), Shambolic, Look At Em Go, Hard Target (1), Ricochet (2D6)

unit.name: Trolls
unit.description: 0-3 Units per Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base: 40x40 mm, Fear, Fearless, Stupid, Fortitude (4+), Troll Belch

unit.name: Grotlings
unit.description: 0-3 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 40x40 mm, Insignificant, Scout, Vanguard, Skirmisher, Light Troops, Unstable, Fearless, Hard Target (1), Throwing Weapons (5+)

unit.name: Scrap Wagon
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units per Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base: 50x100 mm, Fearless, Random Movement (3D6"), Shambolic, Insignificant, Unstable, Fearless, Pursuit Mode, Grotling Crew: Throwing Weapons (5+), Chassis: Harnessed, Impact Hits (2D6)

unit.name: Skewerer
unit.description: single model, 0-4 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 60 mm round, War Machine, Light Armour, Goblin Crew: Common Goblin, Ballista (4+) , Move or Fire

unit.name: Greenhide Catapults
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units per Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base: 75 mm round, War Machine, Light Armour, Goblin Crew: Common Goblin, Move or Fire

unit.name: Gargantula
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units per Army 0-1 Units per Army if it includes any Characters mounted on Gargantula, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base: 100x150 mm, Fearless, Stubborn, Strider, Goblin (8): Forest Goblin, Light Lance, Bow (4+), Gargantula: Harnessed, Venomous Fangs, Poison Attacks

unit.name: Great Green Idol
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units per Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base: 100x100 mm, Fearless, Smash Em Flat, Supernal, Crush Attack, Impact Hits (D3)

unit.name: Giant
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units per Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base: 50x75 mm, Giant See Giant Do, Rage

mount.name: War Boar
mount.description: Standard, Cavalry, 25x50 mm, Harnessed, Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP)

mount.name: Orc Boar Chariot
mount.description: Large, Construct, 50x100 mm, Swiftstride, Eadbasher: Lance, Common Orc, War Boar (2): Harnessed , Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Chassis: Inanimate, Impact Hits (D6+1)

mount.name: Wyvern
mount.description: 0-2 Mounts per Army, Large, Cavalry, 50x50 mm, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Fear, Towering Presence, Harnessed, Poison Attacks, Venomous Fangs

mount.name: Wolf
mount.description: Standard, Cavalry, 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard, Harnessed

mount.name: Goblin Wolf Chariot
mount.description: Large, Construct, 50x100 mm, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Goblin (2): Common Goblin, Light Lance, Bow (4+), Wolf (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Inanimate, Impact Hits (D6+1)

mount.name: Cave Gnasher
mount.description: 0-3 Mounts per Army, Large, Beast, 40x40 mm, Fly (6", 12"), Light Troops, Fearless, Oi it bites!, Bouncers, Hard Target (1), Harnessed, Impact Hits (1)

mount.name: Scuttler Spider
mount.description: Standard, Cavalry, 25x50 mm, Strider, Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard, Scout, Harnessed, Poison Attacks

mount.name: Huntsmen Spider
mount.description: Large, Cavalry, 50x50 mm, Strider, Harnessed, Poison Attacks

mount.name: Gargantula
mount.description: Gigantic, Beast, 100x150 mm, Fearless, Stubborn, Strider, Goblin (8): Forest Goblin, Light Lance, Bow (4+), Gargantula: Harnessed, Poison Attacks, Venomous Fangs

mount.name: Orc Overseer
mount.description: Universal Rule. The Greenhide Catapult loses Insignificant, gains +1 Health Point, its Discipline is set to 7, and its Height changed to Large. When the Greenhide Catapult rolls on the Misfire Table, it may choose to lose 1 Health Point in order to reroll the dice.

item.name: War Cry
item.description: Once per game, at the start of a Player Turn, an Orcs and Goblins General on the Battlefield may utter a War Cry!. All friendly units gain +1" Advance Rate, +2" March Rate, and Swiftstride until the end of the Player Turn.

item.name: Common Orc
item.description: The model part gains Born to Fight .

item.name: Iron Orc
item.description: The model part gains Born to Fight and Weapon Master . The model gains Fearless .

item.name: Feral Orc
item.description: The model part gains Born to Fight and Battle Focus . The model gains Fearless, Frenzy, and Aegis (6+) .

item.name: Common Goblin
item.description: The model gains Insignificant .

item.name: Cave Goblin
item.description: The model gains Insignificant .

item.name: Forest Goblin
item.description: The model gains Insignificant and Strider (Forest).

item.name: Oi it bites
item.description: Units with models with Oi it bites! cannot be joined by Characters.

item.name: Nets
item.description: At the start of each Round of Combat, each unit with one or more models with Nets must choose one enemy unit in base contact and roll a D6. On 2+, the chosen unit is Netted. On a roll of 1, the unit with Nets is Netted. Units Netted one or more times suffer -1 Strength and -1 Armour Penetration until the end of the Round of Combat.

item.name: Shambolic
item.description: Units with Shambolic models cannot be joined by Characters. When rolling the distance of a Random Movement move with a Shambolic unit, if all the dice show the same result, the unit loses D3 Health Points (with no saves of any kind allowed), and then moves in a random direction instead of the chosen direction. When units with Shambolic touch the Board Edge, stop 1" away from Impassable Terrain, or come into contact with or move inside any Terrain Feature other than Open Terrain or Hills, all models in the unit must take a Dangerous Terrain (2) Test.

item.name: Running Amok
item.description: When a unit with Running Amok!! moves using Random Movement, it must move in a random direction instead of the chosen direction.

item.name: Ricochet
item.description: Models with Ricochet cannot Charge enemy units and can move through all units (friend and foe) as if they were Open Terrain. If its move is ended in contact with another unit, or within 1" of a unit that it has moved through, its move distance is extended; keep moving the model in the same direction (still moving through other units) until it can be placed 1" away from all other units. If, after an extended move, the model would end up within 1" of Impassable Terrain or in contact with the Board Edge, immediately remove the model as a casualty. If a units Unit Boundary is contacted by a Ricochet models initial move (i.e. excluding an extension of the move distance needed to clear units), this unit suffers X hits, where X corresponds to the value given in brackets (after completing the move). For this purpose, all units Engaged in the same Combat are treated as a single unit. The owner of the model with Ricochet distributes the hits between all units Engaged in this Combat as evenly as possible (after this follow the normal rules for distributing hits to models within each unit). Enemy units cannot Charge models with Ricochet. Units (friend and foe) ignore models with Ricochet regarding the Unit Spacing rule for all movement (including Ambush). In addition, they can move onto and through models with Ricochet. However, if a unit moves into contact with a Ricochet model, it immediately (before completing the move) suffers X+D6 hits, and the model with Ricochet is removed as a casualty. This is not triggered by moves that can move through units normally (e.g. Flying Movement), unless the move is ended in contact (note that units can move into contact with multiple Ricochet models simultaneously). Hits are resolved with the Strength and Armour Penetration of the model with Ricochet.

item.name: Born to Fight
item.description: Close Combat. The model parts Close Combat Attacks gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration during a Round of Combat: - If it is the First Round of Combat. - Or if the model parts unit is Steadfast while not suffering from Disrupted Ranks at the start of the Round of Combat.

item.name: Venomous Fangs
item.description: Close Combat. Before rolling to hit, nominate one Close Combat Attack from a model part with Venomous Fangs. This attack gains Multiple Wounds (D3+1). If the attack is turned into more than one hit (e.g. a hit with Battle Focus), only a single hit, chosen by the owner, gains the effect.

item.name: Mammoth Stabber
item.description: If the unit is Charging and has at least one Full Rank, nominate a single R&F model in the unit at Initiative Step 10. This model gains Impact Hits (D3). These Impact Hits are resolved with Strength 5, Armour Penetration 2, and Multiple Wounds (D3+1, against Towering Presence).

item.name: Omen of the Apocalypse
item.description: Hand Weapon enchantment. Roll a single D3 at the Initiative Step in which the wielder is attacking. During this Initiative Step, the wielder gains a modifier equal to the result of the D3 roll to its Attack Value, Strength, and Armour Penetration when using this weapon. Attacks made with this weapon become Magical Attacks.

item.name: Mazas Zappin
item.description: Bow enchantment. The wielders unit gains Quick to Fire. This Bow gains Aim (2+), and its profile is changed to: Range 24", Shots 3, Str as user, AP as user, Magical Attacks.

item.name: Shady Shanking
item.description: Hand Weapon and Paired Weapons enchantment. Attacks made with this weapon gain Lightning Reflexes, Lethal Strike, and become Magical Attacks. When fighting a Duel, failed to-wound rolls with attacks with this weapon must be rerolled.

item.name: Tukteks Guard
item.description: Standard and Large Height models only. Suit of Armour enchantment. The wearers model gains +1 Resilience. In addition, attacks made with Lethal Strike lose Lethal Strike when attacking the wearers model.

item.name: Mikinoks Totem
item.description: Cannot be taken by units that count towards Core At the start of each Round of Combat, choose one of the following: - a Special Item* carried by a Character or Champion in a single enemy unit in base contact with the bearers unit. - a Special Item* carried by a single model unit in base contact with the bearers unit. - a Banner Enchantment carried by a Standard Bearer in a single enemy unit in base contact with the bearers unit. The effects of this Special Item* are ignored during this Round of Combat. *or, when fighting a Dwarven Holds army, a combination of Special Items

item.name: Green Tide
item.description: 0-3 Banners per Army. The bearers unit gains Fight in Extra Rank.

item.name: Crown of the Cavern King
item.description: Cannot be taken by models with Towering Presence. All models in the bearers unit that have at least one model part of the Greenhide Races Common Goblin, Cave Goblin, or Forest Goblin gain Vanguard and Feigned Flight. If the bearer is a Common Goblin, Cave Goblin, or Forest Goblin, the range of its Commanding Presence and Rally Around the Flag (if available) is increased by 6".

item.name: Skull Fetish
item.description: Wizards only. Dominant. At the start of any friendly Magic Phase, add X Veil Tokens to your pool, where X is the number of friendly units Engaged in Combat minus the number of friendly Fleeing units. You cannot gain more than 3 Veil Tokens this way. These tokens are in addition to Veil Tokens gained from other sources. The Skull Fetish can never cause a loss of Veil Tokens.

item.name: Troll Ale Flask
item.description: This Special Attack is made at the bearers Agility. In the corresponding Initiative Step, choose an enemy unit that the bearer is able to attack with Close Combat Attacks. This unit suffers a hit with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 10.

item.name: Pan of Protection Pinchin
item.description: When successfully wounded, the bearer may choose to use the attackers Armour value and/or its Special Save: - Use the Armour value that the attacking model would have against the attack that inflicted the wound (including Conditional Application, modifiers, etc.). If so, the bearer cannot use its own Armour (including any modifiers), if available. - Use the Special Save that the attacking model would have against the attack that inflicted the wound (including Conditional Application, modifiers, etc.). If so, the bearer cannot use its own Special Save (including any modifiers), if available. In addition, when the bearers unit is the target of a spell, the bearer gains the same Magic Resistance as the Caster of the spell.

item.name: Bigwing
Wyvern: Bigwing
item.description: Universal Rule. The Wyvern gains Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), and its base size is changed to 75x100 mm.

item.name: Bouncers
item.description: Universal Rule. May only join units of Gnasher Dashers and other Characters on Cave Gnasher (ignore the restrictions in Oi it bites!).

item.name: Spider-Mother Shrine
Gargantula: Spider-Mother Shrine
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Aegis (5+, against Ranged Attacks) and knows one additional Learned Spell.

item.name: Power Shroom
item.description: Universal Rule. Each instance of Power Shroom is One use only. Declare usage just before the model rolls to cast a non-Bound Spell. Any Dispelling Attempt made against this Casting Attempt suffers -D3 to the dispelling roll. Roll this dice directly when using the Power Shroom. If a natural 1 is rolled for this D3, the model using the Power Shroom suffers 1 hit with Toxic Attacks. This is an exception to the Casting and Dispelling Modifier rule (i.e. it is allowed to modify the dispelling roll by more than -2).

item.name: Heavy Armour and Crossbow (4+)
item.description: - Heavy Armour: +2 Armour. - Crossbow: Range 30", Shots 1, Strength 4, AP 1, Unwieldy

item.name: Shady Git
item.description: - This model is part of a Goblin unit. - Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 20x20 mm, Sneaky, Light Armour, Common Goblin, Paired Weapons, Lethal Strike - Adv: 8, Mar: 14, Dis: 6, HP: 1, Def: 4, Res: 3, Arm: 0, Att: 2, Off: 4, Str: 3, AP: 0, Agi: 3 - Sneaky: Universal Rule. The model gains +3 Agility and Lightning Reflexes in the First Round of Combat. Shady Gits are deployed in the unit that purchased them and are Champions, except they gain neither First Among Equals nor Order the Charge.

item.name: Mad Git
item.description: - This model is part of a Goblin unit. - Height: Standard, Type Infantry, Base: 25 mm round, Fearless, Random Movement (2D6"), Shambolic, Ricochet (D6), Running Amok, Surprise, Hard Target (1), Cave Goblin - Adv: 2D6, Mar: -, Dis: 5, HP: 1, Def: 0, Res: 3, Arm: 0, Att: -, Off: 0, Str: 5, AP: 3, Agi: 3 - Surprise: Universal Rule. A Mad Git is not deployed. Instead it is said to be concealed inside the unit that purchased it. It is a unit upgrade, and as such is ignored when calculating Victory Points (its points are already included in the Goblin unit concealing it, and Victory Points are awarded for destroying the unit concealing it). Until released and moved out of its unit, a Mad Git cannot be harmed or otherwise affected, or affect the game in any way. When a Mad Git is removed as a casualty, it does not cause Panic Tests. It still moves, acts, and is influenced by all rules independently like a normal unit (once released) and does not count towards the model count of the unit concealing it. - Mad Gits can be released in two ways: - Mad Gits may be released when their unit declares a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction with a Shooting Weapon (the unit still shoots as normal). If the unit does not have any Shooting Weapons, it may declare a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction with Mad Gits. If so, all Mad Gits in the unit must be released. - At the start of the owners Shooting Phase, if a unit with one or more concealed Mad Gits is not Engaged in Combat, not Fleeing, and is within 8" of an enemy unit, it must immediately release all its Mad Gits. Resolve released Mad Gits one at a time. Place the released Mad Git just outside of base contact with the concealing unit and choose a direction to move the Mad Git in (ignore the Mad Gits Running Amok!!). This cannot be a direction that can potentially bring the released Mad Git into contact with its concealing unit. When releasing the Mad Git, move it using the Shambolic rules in the chosen direction. During this move, rolling the same result on all dice does not cause the Mad Git to lose D3 Health Points or move in a random direction.

item.name: Spear & Shield
Spear & Shield (Forest Goblin)
item.description: - Spear: Attacks made with a Spear gain Fight in Extra Rank and +1 Armour Penetration. Attacks made with a Spear gain +2 Agility and an additional +1 Armour Penetration in the First Round of Combat provided the attacking models unit is not Charging and is not Engaged either in its Flank or Rear Facing. Only Infantry can use Spears. - Shield: +1 Armour

item.name: Shield (armed with Bows)
item.description: +1 Armour

item.name: Creepers
item.description: Universal Rule. 0-20 Models per Unit. The model loses Scoring and gains Skirmisher, Light Troops, and Hard Target (1).

item.name: Rows of Teeth
item.description: Special Attack. Gnashers can make Supporting Attacks even though they have Harnessed. Their Goblin Riders cannot make Supporting Attacks. Gnasher Dashers gain Impact Hits with the following exception: instead of causing a number of hits per Charging model, a Charging Gnasher Dasher unit of up to 5 models causes D3 hits to a single enemy unit in base contact with the units Front Facing, while a unit of 6 or more Gnasher Dashers inflicts 2D3 hits instead.

item.name: They are Everywhere
item.description: Special Attack. When a Gnasher Herd Breaks from Combat, it is removed as a casualty at the end of step 7 of the Round of Combat Sequence (after taking Break Tests), and all units within 6 suffer 1 hit for every 5 Gnashers in the Gnasher Herd, rounding fractions down. Hits are resolved with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 2.

item.name: Look At Em Go
item.description: Universal Rule. After contacting a unit for the first time, a Gnasher Wrecking Team gains Running Amok!! for the rest of the game.

item.name: Troll Belch
item.description: Special Attack. At the model parts Initiative Step, the owner may choose an enemy unit that the model part is able to attack with Close Combat Attacks. If so, this unit suffers a hit, which is resolved with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 10, and the model part with Troll Belch may not perform any Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Stupid
item.description: Universal Rule. At the start of each friendly Player Turn, each unengaged non-Fleeing unit with one or more models with Stupid must take a Discipline Test. If the test is failed, all models in the unit become Shaken until the end of the Player Turn with the following exception: in the Movement Phase, immediately after Rallying Fleeing units, the unit must perform an Advance Move of D6" as far directly forwards as possible.

item.name: Trolls: Cave Troll
item.description: The model gains Magic Resistance (3), and its Armour is set to 3.

item.name: Trolls: Bridge Troll
item.description: The model gains Distracting and Strider (Water Terrain) .

item.name: Pursuit Mode
item.description: Universal Rule. The roll for the distance moved with Random Movement in the Movement Phase is subject to Maximised Roll (consider only the used 3 dice for the purpose of Shambolic).

item.name: Ballista
Ballista (4+)
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Range 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, [Multiple Wounds (D3)], Area Attack (1x5).

item.name: Splatterer (4+)
item.description: Catapult (4x4) Artillery Weapon. Range 12-60", Shots 1, Str 3 [7], AP 0 [4], [Multiple Wounds (D3, Clipped Wings)].

item.name: Git Launcher (4+)
item.description: Catapult Artillery Weapon. Range 12-60", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 4. This weapon follows the rules for Catapult Artillery Weapons with the following exceptions: if the weapon hits (including with a Partial Hit), instead of causing a hit with Area Attack, the unit causes D3+1 hits with the weapons profile. In case of a Partial Hit, neither the number of hits nor their Strength and Armour Penetration are reduced.

item.name: Orc Overseer
item.description: Universal Rule. The Greenhide Catapult loses Insignificant, gains +1 Health Point, its Discipline is set to 7, and its Height changed to Large. When the Greenhide Catapult rolls on the Misfire Table, it may choose to lose 1 Health Point in order to reroll the dice.

item.name: Web Launcher
Web Launcher (4+)
item.description: Catapult (4x4) Artillery Weapon . Range 6-36", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0. All models in a unit that is hit by one or more Web Launchers are considered Stuck until the end of the next Player Turn. Stuck models suffer -D3* Agility. In addition, they treat Dangerous Terrain (1) as Dangerous Terrain (2), and all Terrain (including Open Terrain) that normally would not be Dangerous Terrain for them as Dangerous Terrain (1). *Roll a single D3 directly when hitting with the weapon and apply the result to all models in the unit.

item.name: Smash Em Flat
item.description: Universal Rule. Natural to-wound rolls of 1 with Melee Attacks from units within 6" of a friendly Great Green Idol must be rerolled. Break Tests taken by units within 6" of one or more friendly Engaged Great Green Idols are subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Giant See Giant Do
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Born to Fight.

item.name: Rage
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. Whenever the model loses a Health Point, it gains +1 Attack Value. Whenever it gains a Health Point, it suffers -1 Attack Value.

item.name: Big Brother
item.description: Universal Rule The models Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75x100 mm. The roll for the number of its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

item.name: Giant Club
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Wrecking Ball
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. The wielder gains Fearless , Random Movement (3D6") , Shambolic , and Grind Attacks (D6+X) , where X is equal to the Attack Value modifier the model gains from Rage. The wielder cannot perform any Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Common Goblins
item.description: The model gains the Common Goblin Greenhide Race and Light Armour , and uses the Common Goblin Global and Offensive Characteristics.

item.name: Cave Goblins
item.description: The model gains the Cave Goblin Greenhide Race and uses the Cave Goblin Global and Offensive Characteristics.

item.name: Forest Goblins
item.description: The model gains the Forest Goblin Greenhide Race, uses the Forest Goblin Global and Offensive Characteristics, and its Close Combat Attacks become Poison Attacks .
